name: Spectra
description: Spectra is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, classic buttons, foundry arms and legs, cat-themed screen, and stylish glasses, Spectra stands out from the crowd. It is a sophisticated and intelligent robot, equipped with advanced features to analyze and display electronic waveforms. Spectra's abilities, skills, and alignment make it a valuable asset within the WebtrES club.
